definition: to amass/to accumulate/to store/measured quantity (such as area of volume)/product (the result of multiplication)/to integrate (math.)/to solve (or integrate) an ordinary differential equation (math.)/old/long-standing

sentences.english: The government is cleansing its own Augeon stables.
sentences.chinese: 該政府正致力於清除其自身的積弊。

sentences.english: How to clean the Augean stables of this city remains a critical problem.
sentences.chinese: 如何掃除這個城市的積弊仍然是個緊要問題。

sentences.english: Their work was to cleanse the Augean stable in the moral field.
sentences.chinese: 他們的任務是清除道德領域裏的積弊。

sentences.english: How to clean the Augean stables of this city remains a critical problem.
sentences.chinese: 如何掃除這個成績的積弊仍然是個緊要問題。
